text: E'ina nehu'za zafafintira teve'zana osuge, zafa antagigera 7ni'a kafufina osugahaze. Na'ankure zamagra fri'naza sondia vahe'mokizmi ha'zanteti tevea hugregahaze. Hagi rohu'ma eme zamare'za zamazeri havizama nehu'za mika zazimima eri'naza vahera, ana hu'za zamagrira arohu ome zamare'za mika zazmia erigahaze huno Mikazama kegavama hu'nea Ra Anumzamo'a hu'ne.
